item.title: Rubber band of knwledge
item.description: How would you visualize all of the knowledge in the world? Sphere of knowledge that is growing very fast? One way I like to think about it is a rubber band that is being stretched. If you were to lay all of human knowledge in a line from easy to difficult. you could put people somewhere on that rubber band but because knowledge is growing so rapidly the rubber band would be stretching out really fast
